name: Index to Foreign Legal Periodicals
description: Multilingual index to articles and book reviews appearing in 470 legal journals published worldwide. Provides in-depth coverage of public and private international law, comparative and foreign law, and the law of all jurisdictions other than the United States, the U.K., Canada, and Australia. IFLP also analyzes the contents of approximately eighty individually published collections of legal essays, Festschriften, MÃ©langes, and congress reports each year. Dates of coverage: 1985 to present.
